p: Besides seeds, its leaves are also effective against diabetes; Hedge and Jaisal [ 111] reported this for an ethanolic extract of H. pubescens leaves at a dose of 400 mg/kg BW of rats when administrated for 21 consecutive days. The methanol extract of this plant also possesses significant ( p < 0.05) hypoglycemic activity in vivo [ 112]. A study by Bhusal [ 113] indicated a notable antidiabetic activity, specifically with an alcoholic extract, nearly equal to standard glibenclamide.
